title: Edit
description: Use it inside a button which opens the editing mode

title: DocDuplicate
description: Use it inside a button which makes a copy of a file

title: Duplicate
description: Use it inside a button which makes a copy of any item

title: Delete
description: Use it inside a button which deletes the any item

title: EmptyTrash
description: Use it inside a button which permanently destroys the content from the trash list

title: Add
description: Use it inside a button which creates a new item or increases the value of a number

title: Minus
description: Use it inside a button which decreases number value

title: Confirm
description: Use it inside a button which confirms the changes or use it next to a static item which is shown as included

title: Dismiss
description: Use it inside a button which dismisses the changes, removes the changes or item, or use it next to a static item which is shown as not included

title: More
description: Use it inside a button which displays more buttons

title: Replace
description: Use it inside a button which proceeds to replace a content

title: Refresh
description: Use it inside a button which refreshes the content or use it next to a static item which is being or needs to be refreshed.

title: Revert
description: Use it inside a button which reverts changes to a previous or initial state

title: Print
description: Use it inside a button which opens a printer dialog

title: Archive
description: Use it inside a button which moves an item to archive or redirects to an archive

title: Unarchive
description: Use it inside a button which put an item back to the list from an archive

title: DownloadImport
description: Use it inside a button which downloads or imports  content or item

title: UploadExport
description: Use it inside a button which uploads or imports content or item

title: Link
description: Use it inside a button which adds link to an internal or external source of content or copies a link to a clipboard

title: Unlink
description: Use it inside a button which removes linked source of content

title: Pin
description: Use it inside a button which pins item to position in the list or a layout

title: Search
description: Use it inside an input which searches for content or an item

title: Tag
description: Use it inside a button which adds label to content or item in order to categorise it using descriptive keywords

title: Block
description: Use it inside a button which prohibits or terminates certain content, item or actions. Also use it inline with the content to indicate that certain actions are not allowed.

title: DistributeGlobe
description: Use it inside a button which makes content accessible via multiple sources or platforms.

title: TaskAdd
description: Use it inside a button which adds item to a list

title: TaskComplete
description: Use it inside a button which marks item as completed

title: PromoteFilled
description: Use it inside a button which advertises or announces content and at the same time is active.

title: Promote
description: Use it inside a button which advertise or announce content or item.

title: Preview
description: Use it inside a button which opens up a preview of a file

title: Share
description: Use it inside a button which shares content or item

title: Site
description: Use it next to a content which controls or indicates actions happening on a desktop (i.e. desktop notifications in Inbox)

title: SiteMove
description: Use it inside a button which moves site to a desired location

title: SiteDuplicate
description: Use it inside a button which duplicates a site

title: SiteAdd
description: Use it inside a button which adds or creates a new site

title: Send
description: Use it inside a button which sends a message, mail or a newsletter.

title: Filter
description: Use it inside a button which opens filter option for content or item.

title: Settings
description: Use it inside a button which opens content or item settings

title: Home
description: Use it inside a button which redirects to the main web page

title: Location
description: Use it inside a button which adds or next to the content which defines content or item location.

title: AppMarket
description: Use it inside of a button which redirects to App Market

title: Mobile
description: Use it inside of a button which opens a mobile view of a site or next to a content which is related to a mobile environment (i.e. mobile notifications)

title: ExternalLink
description: Use it inside a button which adds a link to another domain or opens content on a new tab

title: Coupon
description: Use it inside a button which displays discount coupons or redirects to its manager

title: Code
description: Use it inside a button which displays, lets to insert or edit code.

title: Hint
description: Use it inside a button or next to inline item which gives valuable information to a user

title: Gift
description: Use it next to inline item which tells about special premium offer or a gift

title: InfoCircle
description: Use it next to field labels or other interface elements which need to display additional information in a tooltip

title: Info
description: Use it inside a button which displays additional information

title: HelpCircle
description: Use it next to interface elements which need to display Wix Support Articles

title: Help
description: Use it inside a button which displays Wix Support Article

title: Statistics
description: Use it inside a button which displays statistics

title: Smile
description: Use it inside a button which opens emoji library

title: Languages
description: Use it inside a button which opens site language selection

title: Badge
description: Indicate that user is a site member or link to management of the badges

title: PenNib
description: Indicates blog post or a vector tool

title: PenNibAdd
description: Or add a contributor (or maybe it's a misuse of an icon ?)

title: Note
description: Add a new note or display existing ones

title: Hotel
description: Indicate or link to Wix Hotels

title: DataCollection
description: Display data collection as a table

title: AutomationsFilled
description: View and manage automations list

title: Automations
description: View and manage automations list

description: View the desktop version of a site

title: Public
description: Indicate that information is publicly accessible
